item.title: How I Pass The Azure DP-100 Exam
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this to: fit <- lm(dist ~ speed + I(speed^2), data = cars) summary(fit) ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed + I(speed^2), data = cars) ## ## Residuals: ## Min 1Q Median 3Q Max ## -28.
